channel.title: Portal Only for DONATORS
channel.description: I put a portal at home, when i click on it, it takes me to train, i want it to take me to the donator zone but only Members (donators) can go there.

item.title: Portal Only for DONATORS
item.dc:creator: @Rune.Kings Rune.Kings
item.description:
@Rune.Kings wrote:

[quote=“LKCTheReturn, post:2, topic:320883”]Alright you’ll want something like this…

if (objectID == ####) && playerIsMember <= 1); // #### = portal, gate, door.. etc.. { sendMessage("you need to be a _______ to pass through.."); } else } teleportToX = 2998; //x coordinates teleportToY = 3918;//y coordinates sendMessage("Welcome the the _______"); } }

might need:

else if(objectID = ####) && playerIsMember >= 1);

idk fumble around with the code if it doesn’t work :)[/quote]

Declare playerIsMember, change the #### to the portal id, then put it in Clicking Object Method.

Edit: Oh, also, change the coords to your “member zone”

Read full topic

idk fumble around with the code if it doesn’t work

To fix 100 errors remember

for every { you MUST ALWAYS HAVE }
